name: Minority Retort
bio:
Minority Retort is one of Portland’s most popular and critically acclaimed comedy shows and celebrates diversity like none other. Hosted by comedian Jeremy Eli and co-produced by writer/radio show host Jason Lamb, Minority Retort's goal is to provide comedians of color with a platform to speak their minds and share their unique perspectives, as well as reach the multicultural comedy audience that exists within the so-called "whitest city in America". Nationally recognized comedians such as Baron Vaughn (Netflix’s Grace & Frankie), Janine Brito (FX’s Totally Biased), Zainab Johnson (HBO) and Maggie Maye (Conan) have performed on the show, as well as many comics frequently featured in Portland's Bridgetown Comedy Festival: Nathan Brannon, Bri Pruett, Elicia Sanchez, Anthony Lopez, Curtis Cook, Adam Pasi, David Mascorro, and Katie Nguyen.

Minority Retort is also a part of XRAY FM radio’s morning show Fridays at 8:40am.

For more info, visit Minority Retort on Facebook or on Twitter at @iMinorityRetort.
copy: Minority Retort is the NW's premier standup showcase featuring comedians of color! Hosted by comedian Jeremy Eli and co-produced by writer/radio show host Jason Lamb, Minority Retort's goal is to provide performers with a platform to speak their minds and share their unique perspectives, as well as reach the multicultural comedy audience that exists within the so-called "whitest city in America".
